clinical_study.brief_title: Influence of the COvid-19 Epidemic on STRESS
clinical_study.official_title: The COVISTRESS Study: Influence of the COvid-19 Epidemic on STRESS

brief_summary.textblock:
The Coronavirus has a major influence on stress for the general population. However, data are
      currently non-existent concerning the perception and knowledge of the epidemic, the feeling
      of information from companies / establishments / governments, the means of protection used,
      the feelings of fear generated and their impact on feelings of stigmatization towards certain
      ethnic groups or categories of patients (those who cough ...), or relationships with
      socio-demographic factors or lifestyle.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is an observational study using a REDCap® questionnaire via an internet link, which will
      be distributed by any means (Facebook, Twitter, institution mailing lists via a referent,
      flash codes distributed to patients and the public, etc.).

      The self-questionnaire will assess stress, perception and knowledge of the epidemic, the
      feeling of information on the part of businesses / establishments / governments, the means of
      protection used the feelings of fear generated and their impact on feelings of stigmatization
      towards certain ethnic groups or categories of patients (those who cough ...), or
      relationships with socio-demographic factors or lifestyle.
